summary: The Strokes are an American rock band from New York City, formed in 1998. The band includes Julian Casablancas (lead singer), Nick Valensi and Albert Hammond Jr. (guitarists), Nikolai Fraiture (bassist), and Fabrizio Moretti (drummer). They gained popularity in the early 2000s with their debut album "Is This It," which was critically acclaimed. After some ups and downs, they released "The New Abnormal" in 2020, winning the Grammy for Best Rock Album. They've been on hiatus but remain influential in rock music.
title: The Strokes
